goal.en: The objectives of this class are to let graduate students learn about channel information and channel capacity, information lossless coding and information lossy coding. Both random channel coding theorem and rate distortion theorem will be derived, and in addition source coding techniques will be introduced.
goal.ch: 本課程將針對研究所學生介紹通道容量,通道相互消息相關之消息理論，無失真壓縮碼（即所謂的熵碼）及失真壓縮碼。除了介紹一些常用的熵編碼技術如霍夫曼編碼、算術編碼、吉輔－藍普編碼，以及量化、轉換編碼……等失真壓縮技術外，也將探討其相關之消息理論。

content.en:
週次 內容 備註
1 Channel Mutual Information
2 Channel Capacity and Capacity Computation
3 Random Coding Theorem
4 Random Coding Theorem
5 Information Sources
6 Entropy Function
7 Block Entropy Function and Condition Entropy Function
8 Prediction Entropy Function
9 Entropy Coding
10 Prefix Coding
11 Arithmetic Coding and QM-Coder
12 Universal Coding – Ziv-Lempel Coding
13 Rate Distortion Function and its Computation
14 Rate Distortion Theorem
15 Rate Distortion Theorem
16 Quantization
17 Predictional Quantization
18 Transform Codin
content.ch:
週次 內容 備註
1 通道相互消息
2 通道容量及通道容量計算
3 隨機編碼理論
4 隨機編碼理論
5 消息源
6 消息含量與熵函數
7 區塊熵函數與條件熵函數
8 預測熵函數
9 熵編碼技術
10 字首碼
11 算術碼與QM–碼器
12 通用碼―吉輔–藍普碼
13 碼率失真函數R(D)介紹及計算
14 碼率失真理論
15 失真壓縮編碼技術
16 量化
17 預測量化
18 轉換編碼
